channel.title: 1.5 on Edmonton Go
channel.description: Recent content in 1.5 on Edmonton Go

item.title: August 2015 Meetup
item.description: Food at 6:30 pm. Please RSVP at Meetup or Google+. News and Talks at 6:45. Talks Introduction to Reflection Nicholas Boers (slides) Software Defined Networking Gerrit Renker and Curtis Collicutt What's New in Go 1.5 Matthias Stone News and Articles Go 1.5 is released (release notes) Google’s In-House Programming Language Now Runs on Phones Wired Cross compilation with Go 1.5 Online Talks GopherCon 2015 Roundup (videos, lightning talk videos) Stupid Gopher Tricks by Andrew Gerrand (Golang UK) Learning Resources Mark Bates on Go Core Techniques and Tools Events Monthly Hack Day September 12 (RSVP required) Edmonton Go Meetup - September
